verses.name: John 17:13
verses.text: And now come I to thee; and these things I speak in the world, that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves.

verses.name: John 17:14
verses.text: I have given them thy word; and the world hath hated them, because they are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.

verses.name: John 17:15
verses.text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world, but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil.

verses.name: John 17:16
verses.text: They are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.

verses.name: John 17:17
verses.text: Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.
